Constructed with the latest eco-friendly materials, this community prioritizes sustainability while ensuring comfort and luxury. The tall silver pine trees, from which the community gets its name, dot the skyline and provide refreshing shade during the summer months. Residents can benefit from the meticulously landscaped gardens, which are interspersed with cozy seating areas and beautiful water features. The community center offers various activities, fostering a sense of camaraderie among neighbors.
